vision.notes: Likely present as it is common in most frog families. Further research is needed to understand the specific visual capabilities of Craugastoridae species.

audition.notes: Audition is likely present as it is common in most frog families. Further research is needed to understand the specific auditory capabilities of Craugastoridae species, including frequency ranges.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception (taste and smell) is likely present in Craugastoridae, playing a role in prey detection and possibly intraspecific communication, similar to other frogs.

mechanoreception.notes: Mechanoreception (touch, vibration sensing) is likely present, crucial for detecting predators, prey, and navigating their environment. Includes lateral line system in tadpoles, if present.
